name: Hl7VSOccurrenceCode
title: hl7VS-occurrenceCode
description: Concepts drawn from the National Uniform Billing Committee (NUBC) code for the event or occurrence relating to a bill that may affect payer processing.  Used in Version 2 messaging in the Occurrence Code and Date (OCD) value.
